summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons Health Services document recording that inmate Jeffrey Edward Epstein had no known allergies as of July 6, 2019. It is a standard medical form from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the medical record, listed as an inmate with no known allergies.

events.title: Medical Record Entry
events.description: A Bureau of Prisons Health Services form was created, noting Jeffrey Epstein had no known allergies.

locations: Bureau of Prisons - NYM (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate in Bureau of Prisons custody as of July 6, 2019.
Epstein's medical record indicated he had no known allergies.
The document is a standard health services form from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
